description: Try our easy to follow Cheese & Poppy Seed Crackers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cracker & savoury biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free
name: Cheese & Poppy Seed Crackers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process flour, butter, cheese, mustard and 1 tbs water in a food processor until a fine sand forms. Turn out onto a lightly floured surface and knead briefly until a smooth dough forms. Roll into a 3.5cm diameter x 30cm-long log.
Spread poppy seeds on a large sheet of baking paper. Roll log in poppy seeds to coat. Wrap in baking paper and chill for 20 minutes.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cut the log into 1cm-thick slices and arrange in a single layer on tray. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden. Transfer crackers to a wire rack to cool.
